import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { User, Mail, Calendar, Save, Edit3 } from 'lucide-react'; const Profile = () => { const { user, updateProfile } = useAuth(); const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: user?.name || '', email: user?.email || '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); const success = await updateProfile(formData); if (success) { setIsEditing(false); } setLoading(false); }; const handleCancel = () => { setFormData({ name: user?.name || '', email: user?.email || '' }); setIsEditing(false); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Two-factor auth Not enabled

); }; export default Profile;
